LanguageData.Whisperofplanet.label: Whispers of a Planet
LanguageData.Whisperofplanet.comps.0.discoverLetterTe: A foreign planet is whispering to {0}. They will see a vague shadow of the future, giving them slightly better sight.
LanguageData.PlanetariumAddiction.label: Planetarium Addiction
LanguageData.PlanetariumAddiction.comps.0.discoverLet: A small amount of planetarium permanently flows through {0}'s body. They will need a permanent supply of planetarium to prevent withdrawals.
LanguageData.PlanetariumAddiction.stages.1.label: Permanent
